author: andschwa
body: The host unfortunately strayed from its use of `this.myHost.UI` for writing output (which we can later utilize to allows colors to be set from users' profiles).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Really this means expanding on #298 to provide full `$host.UI` support in the console, and is at least one of the blockers for #644.

title: Replace use of System.Console with this.myHost.UI for output
